alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 9:29AM CDT until June 29 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Polk County in central Iowa... Madison County in south central Iowa... Dallas County in central Iowa... Northern Warren County in south central Iowa... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 928 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Winterset, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Des Moines, West Des Moines, Urbandale, Johnston, Clive, Indianola, Waukee, Norwalk, Pleasant Hill, Grimes, Winterset, Adel, Windsor Heights, Carlisle, Dallas Center, Earlham, De Soto, Van Meter, Southridge Mall and Jordan Creek Town Center. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 51 and 72. Interstate 80 between mile markers 97 and 131. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 11. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
